attributes.action: Michael Grove & DEFRA to end the inhumane Badger Cull & use Biosecurity Measures
attributes.additional_details:
Humans are capable of carrying bovine TB, as are sheep, goats, horses, pigs, deer, dogs, cats, foxes, mink, badgers, ferrets, rats, squirrels, otters, seals, hares, & moles.

There have been very few incidences of bovine TB spreading to people in the UK
DEFRA should be working with the NFU to roll out Biosecurity measures for farm animals & stop the cull now as a complete waste of taxpayers money! 

As an improvement in Farming practices, we should no longer target our dwindling wildlife.
attributes.background:
The UK goverment has just taken the ill informed decision to extend the Badger Cull even though many reports have shown the ineffectiveness of such a cruel kill reducing the incidence of bovine TB amongst herds.

A cull of badgers is insane. Many species are capable of carrying Bovine TB.
